title: California Firm Recalls Ground Beef Products Due to Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 5, 2011 - American Food Service, a Pico Rivera, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 3,170 pounds of fresh ground beef patties and other bulk packages of ground beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food...
impacted_products: (559002) American Companies 100% Pure Ground Beef 30-lb. case
